name: INTERDIMENSIONAL DEMON SLAYING SAMURAI WARRIOR
description:
"A portal has opened up in the sky - Demons pour through into this world. A rocket has been set up to destroy the rift, defend it until the fuse runs out."

My first game on itch.io, created for VillageBear's GAME JAMuary over the span of a month. The theme was fireworks, although the game ended up being kinda unrelated :P

The art style is inspired by the flash series Armed with Wings (my pixel art sucks so I went with "minimalist" silhouettes to focus on the animation), and the combat system comes from the Smash Brothers series.

Check the ingame tutorial to see how to play, movement is WASD and menu controls are Arrow Keys and Enter to select. I didn't have time to add gamepad support or compose the music so I may come back and do them in future.
